<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=210)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

On the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), some mortals worship [norns](/Monsters.aspx?ID=742) as deities, while others, especially witches and bards, admire them as patrons or muses. Those who uphold norns as deities are known as Followers of Fate. Norns do little to discourage this veneration, but neither do they go out of their way to support such worship. Clerics who venerate norns might worship a specific norn or norn triumvirate, or all norns as a whole, but they gain the same benefits regardless of their choice. The religious symbol of Followers of Fate is a pair of shears cutting a golden thread, and their areas of concern are destiny, fate, and the aging process.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** make predictions of the future, offer advice and guidance to those in positions of power, provide comfort to the elderly

**Anathema** apologize for making an incorrect prediction, disrespect mothers, accept payment for fortune-telling

**Area of Concern**
destiny, fate, and the aging process.

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [Shears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=119)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195)

- **3rd**
[Threefold Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=723)

- **5th**
[Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239)

</column>
